title: REsolution keeps changing when I play league.
body: When I play league my screen resolution outside of league keeps becoming huge, bigger than I can even set myself on my computer, this has only started as of recently. And that results in me getting alot of screen freezing inside of league, especially when I type. Ive tried restaring my computer twice. I dont know what to do now

replies.body:
Okay so I just fixed mine that was doing the exact same thing it sounds like. If we are thinking of the same thing you are going to follow this path.

This PC/Windows (C:)/Riot Games/League of Legends

From there you are going to right click on the file lol.launcher, then click on properties, click on the Compatibility tab and uncheck the "Run in 640x480 screen resolution" box

It sounds like your graphics driver might be failing if it's making your resolution change like that, based on your description.  I recommend using the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide, especially the portion on drivers to make sure that they are up to date.  Also keep in mind that 4k and resolutions higher than 1920x1080 are not supported, and you will need to reduce it for smooth play.  I hope that helps!
